body: Hi Mostapha, thanks! I tried the outdoor demo file on my office computer today, and I got error on the blockMesh component: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/S8fITn3IbttpS6JZDLfCUml68EQCOrPJCYzHEc0EtPxNEHVXBDChUn4CGytsqeAcnJrOstoYsDW7OX0nlJZtFlyuPnkhad15/Image3.png) Is it because that butterfly cannot find my container ID? I do have OF v1606 installed, and the OF_plus_1606 container is shown in docker: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/S8fITn3IbtsYtK8tIDs-JfkX-KaFwUFmtniGGsxTIiOEIN-p5hs9vPQ5KDMq0*9Fo7RVlAxXGsEBOK6NDbGmDyx0BrTq18gu/Image1.png) and I can run OF through executing OpenFOAM_start.exe: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/S8fITn3IbtuayvVz2eSfzilbj**vBTyse95hym15Y6XE7yxx1ueohk3BV7CNnU0IYzRVWgNViAJILjrLb*9WTGocq6*NMFkR/Image2.png) Dose this mean I didn't get OF installed correctly? Hope you can kindly advise!
